headline: Is Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Pricing Reflecting Its Mixed Returns And DCF Upside Potential
summary: If you are wondering whether Occidental Petroleum's current share price lines up with its underlying value, you are not alone. This article is built to help you frame that question clearly. Occidental Petroleum's share price closed at US$43.51 recently, with a 7 day return of a 1.8% decline, a 30 day return of 8.0%, a year to date return of 2.7%, a 1 year return of an 11.4% decline and a 3 year return of a 29.1% decline, set against a 5 year return of 124.4%. headline: Occidental Petroleum: Buffett Overhang Still Exists
summary: Occidental Petroleum trades at 30x 2026 EPS at $40 with a $9.7B OxyChem sale for debt reduction and a Buffett premium. Find out why OXY stock is a hold.
